settings.description_text: A guided walking program to reset your daily rhythm, reconnect with your body, and build a sustainable movement practice.

settings.heading_text: It's a reclamation of yourself and your life
settings.description_text:
Reclaim your energy, clarity, and calm in just 14 days.
The WalkFully Refresh guides you to move with intention, reduce stress, boost focus, and feel more alive—no gear, no pressure, no judgment.

settings.card_1_description: Each one will gently push you different directions to explore the wide variety of profound impacts walking can have on your life
settings.card_2_description: Even when you're going solo, you're walking as part of a new movement – based on the most ancient and essential movement
settings.card_3_description: Simple, powerful surveys that help you see yourself shift. Awareness is what makes change last

settings.description_text:
Because lasting change comes from presence, practiced daily.

Research shows that even short, consistent behavioral shifts over two weeks can start to reshape patterns in the brain, regulate stress, and boost physical well-being.

Our program is designed to easily:
settings.benefit_1_description: feel lighter, clearer, and more focused each day
settings.benefit_2_description: calm your nervous system and reset your mood naturally
settings.benefit_5_description: learn tools and habits you'll carry well beyond 14 days

settings.eyebrow_text: Two weeks. Nothing to prove. Everything to gain.
